name: C.C. C2 Code Geass Cosplay Full + Green Wig
description:
Shipped with tracking information. I accept Paypal. PM ME if interested. Thanks.

Includes: Everything but the boots.
- Green wig (will not sell separately)
-3 waist belts
-entire costume you see in photo (the full coat/whatever the bodysuit is)
-2 arm sleeves
-2 belts for arm sleeves
- white shorts (the shorts in the anime are white so it is accurate)

(note: the two photos on the right are not mine but the costumes are exactly the same and the left photo is proof i own it even though im not wearing all of the pieces. MY photo also shows more accurate colors of the black and light blue accurate to anime.)

Condition: Looks New. I never wore it to a convention because I never got a group going. The wig is used but washed and clean.

ANOTHER PHOTO:
http://i.ebayimg.com/t/C-C-c2-code-geass-cc-r2-FREE-WIG-cosplay-costume-USA-SELLER-fast-shipping-/00/s/MTAyNFgzNDU=/z/v6kAAOxypthRvTDz/$%28KGrHqRHJEUFGru+B%29l5BRvTDzPt!g~~60_57.JPG

My measurement:
34" bust
26" waist
34" hips
Waist will fit up to around 29"/30" based on the measurements i took.

- belt

Size: Small/Medium

Will fit similar sizes. This costume is slightly bigger than the Orb costume.

---------
OPTIONAL PURCHASE: ACCURATE Blue Athrun Zala wig styled specifically for Athrun.
With costume is an additional $10.

name: 2 - NO LIES JUST LOVE - COUPLES DISCOUNT $$ CHEAP!
description:
Couples Discount!
[Buying this will give you TWO wristbands]




Finally here, NO LIES JUST LOVE one inch wide wristband. Made from silicone, won't easily tear. White wristband with Debossed text and ink injected in black. NOT just cheaply printed on. **GLOWS IN THE DARK! :) Standard size fits all wrists. Order now and help me out with college :)

*email me if you've got any questions xxkiwixbunniexx@yahoo.com with subject CUSTOMER

* I AM NOT RESPONSIBLE if you enter the wrong paypal address. I usually ship between 3pm and 7pm Pacific time. Please confirm your paypal address before placing your order. If you send me the wrong address i may not have time to read it before i ship out. I usually package orders within minutes after the order is placed even before I go to the post office. It happened before but luckily i read the email in time and switched the packaging! Please be careful!
